General.Name: Triton Development S.A.
General.Description: Triton Development S.A. engages in the housing construction business in Poland. It offers apartments in multi-family buildings, and single-family and semi-detached houses. Triton Development S.A. was founded in 1992 and is based in Warsaw, Poland.

1.Name: Mr. Jacek  Luczak
1.Title: CFO & VP of the Management Board
